definition: tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Objective To study the quality standard of Gegenbao Soft Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究葛根宝软胶囊的质量控制标准。

sentences.english: Radix Puerariae is one of the commonly-used herbal drugs and is of great value in clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 葛根为常用中药之一，具有广泛的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Written by Mogadishu eat more papaya milk, Kudzu is the best.
sentences.chinese: 按摩加多吃写木瓜牛奶，葛根是最好的。

sentences.english: Puerarin content was determined by high performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) method in Geqi granule.
sentences.chinese: 采用高效液相色谱法测定葛芪颗粒中葛根素含量。

sentences.english: The company also markets different Pueraria products, including pills and tea.
sentences.chinese: 该公司也将销售不同的野葛根，包括药丸和茶。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical curative effects of Puerarin combination with Shuxuening injection in the treatment of acute ischemic stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察舒血宁联合葛根素急性缺血性脑卒中的疗效。

sentences.english: The content of Puerarin was determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 用高效液相色谱法测定葛根中葛根素的含量。

sentences.english: The content of Puerarin was determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 用高效液相色谱法测定葛根中葛根素的含量。

sentences.english: Aim To study the protective effects of Kudzu preparations on liver injuries induced by ethanol in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究葛根制剂对小鼠乙醇性肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Gegen Mixture could alleviate the alcohol intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 结论复方葛根合剂具有解酒作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ionic crosslinking method is applicable to the preparation of puerarin chitosan nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 结论离子交联法适用于葛根素壳聚糖纳米粒的制备。

sentences.english: Objective To study the best harvesting period and initial processing method of Gegen.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究葛根的最佳采收期和初加工技术。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To extract and separate puerarin from roots of Pueraria lobata(Willd. )Ohwi with water.
sentences.chinese: 目的用水作溶剂，从葛根中提取分离葛根素。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To extract and separate puerarin from roots of Pueraria lobata(Willd. )Ohwi with water.
sentences.chinese: 目的用水作溶剂，从葛根中提取分离葛根素。

sentences.english: Therefore, this technology of enzymatic preparation may lay the foundation of processing for kudzu root dietary fiber.
sentences.chinese: 因此，该酶法工艺为葛根膳食纤维的制备提供了依据。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a quality standard of Naoqing oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立脑清口服液中葛根素的鉴别及含量测定方法。

definition: Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
